mapper.sql: ID as id, LOTTERYID as lotteryId, DIRECT_RET as directRet, THREEONE_RET as threeoneRet, CREATE_TIME as createTime, UPDATE_TIME as updateTime, USERID as userid, SET_TYPE as setType, STATUS as status, BET_TYPE as betType, SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID as sysGroupAwardId, SUPER_RET as superRet, LHC_YEAR as lhcYear, LHC_COLOR as lhcColor, SB_THREE_ONE as sbThreeoneRet, LHC_FLATCODE as lhcFlatcode, LHC_HALFWAVE as lhcHalfwave, LHC_ONEYEAR as lhcOneyear, LHC_NOTIN as lhcNotin, LHC_CONTINUEIN23 as lhcContinuein23, LHC_CONTINUEIN4 as lhcContinuein4, LHC_CONTINUEIN5 as lhcContinuein5, LHC_CONTINUENOTIN23 as lhcContinuenotin23, LHC_CONTINUENOTIN4 as lhcContinuenotin4, LHC_CONTINUENOTIN5 as lhcContinuenotin5, LHC_CONTINUECODE as lhcContinuecode
mapper.insert:
SELECT SEQ_GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP_ID.Nextval from dual
INSERT INTO GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP ( ID , LOTTERYID , DIRECT_RET , THREEONE_RET , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_TIME , USERID , SET_TYPE , STATUS , BET_TYPE , SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID , SUPER_RET , LHC_YEAR , LHC_COLOR , SB_THREE_ONE, LHC_FLATCODE, LHC_HALFWAVE, LHC_ONEYEAR, LHC_NOTIN, LHC_CONTINUEIN23, LHC_CONTINUEIN4, LHC_CONTINUEIN5, LHC_CONTINUENOTIN23, LHC_CONTINUENOTIN4, LHC_CONTINUENOTIN5, LHC_CONTINUECODE ) VALUES ( #{id,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{lotteryid,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{directRet,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{threeoneRet,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{createTime,javaType=date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{updateTime,javaType=date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , #{userid,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{setType,javaType=int,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{status,javaType=int,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{betType,javaType=int,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{sysGroupAwardId,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{superRet,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{lhcYear,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{lhcColor,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sbThreeoneRet,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lhcFlatcode,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{lhcHalfwave,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{lhcOneyear,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{lhcNotin,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{lhcContinuein23,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{lhcContinuein4,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{lhcContinuein5,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{lhcContinuenotin23,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{lhcContinuenotin4,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{lhcContinuenotin5,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , #{lhcContinuecode,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} )
mapper.update: UPDATE GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP SET LOTTERYID = #{lotteryid,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , DIRECT_RET = #{directRet,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , THREEONE_RET = #{threeoneRet,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,javaType=date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,javaType=date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , USERID = #{userid,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , SET_TYPE = #{setType,javaType=int,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , STATUS = #{status,javaType=int,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , BET_TYPE = #{betType,javaType=int,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID = #{sysGroupAwardId,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUPER_RET = #{superRet,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} WHERE ID = #{id}

UPDATE GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP SET DIRECT_RET = #{directRet,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , THREEONE_RET = #{threeoneRet,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , SUPER_RET = #{superRet,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , STATUS = #{status,javaType=int,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, update_time = #{updateTime,javaType=date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LHC_YEAR = #{lhcYear,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , LHC_COLOR = #{lhcColor,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , SB_THREE_ONE = #{sbThreeoneRet,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LHC_FLATCODE = #{lhcFlatcode,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , LHC_HALFWAVE = #{lhcHalfwave,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , LHC_ONEYEAR = #{lhcOneyear,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , LHC_NOTIN = #{lhcNotin,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , LHC_CONTINUEIN23 = #{lhcContinuein23,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , LHC_CONTINUEIN4 = #{lhcContinuein4,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , LHC_CONTINUEIN5 = #{lhcContinuein5,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , LHC_CONTINUENOTIN23 = #{lhcContinuenotin23,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , LHC_CONTINUENOTIN4 = #{lhcContinuenotin4,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , LHC_CONTINUENOTIN5 = #{lhcContinuenotin5,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , LHC_CONTINUECODE = #{lhcContinuecode,javaType=long,jdbcType=DECIMAL} WHERE LOTTERYID = #{lotteryid} and USERID = #{userid} and sys_award_group_id= #{sysGroupAwardId}

UPDATE GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP SET DIRECT_RET = #{directRet,javaType=int,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , THREEONE_RET = #{threeoneRet,javaType=int,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , SUPER_RET = #{superRet,javaType=int,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,javaType=date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,javaType=date,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} , SET_TYPE = #{setType,javaType=int,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , STATUS = #{status,javaType=int,jdbcType=DECIMAL} , BET_TYPE = #{betType,javaType=int,jdbcType=DECIMAL} WHERE LOTTERYID = #{lotteryid} and USERID = #{userid}
mapper.select:
select
from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP where ID = #{id}

select from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP where id in
#{item}
select from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP g where USERID = #{userid} and exists (select 1 from game_series s where s.lotteryid = g.lotteryid and s.status = 1 )

select
,( select G.AWARD_NAME from GAME_AWARD_GROUP G where G.ID = T.SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID) as awardName from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP T where USERID = #{userid} and T.lotteryid in ( #{lotteryid} )

select
,( select G.AWARD_NAME from GAME_AWARD_GROUP G where G.ID = T.SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID) as awardName from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP T where USERID = #{userid} and T.lotteryid =#{lotteryid} order by awardName asc
select count(*) from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP
select count(*) from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP
select from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryId} and userid=#{userId} and status=1 and BET_TYPE=1

select COUNT(userid) from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP where LOTTERYID = #{lotteryId} and userid in (select ID from USER_CUSTOMER where USER_CHAIN like (select USER_CHAIN from USER_CUSTOMER t where t.id = #{userid})||'%')

select t2.lotteryid as lotteryid, t1.bet_type as betType, t1.id as awardGroupid, t2.lottery_name as awardName from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP t1, GAME_SERIES t2 where t1.USERID = #{userid} and t1.bet_type = 1 and t1.lotteryid=t2.lotteryid and t2.status = 1 order by t2.lotteryid

select t2.lotteryid as lotteryid, t2.lottery_series_code as lotterySeriesCode, t1.bet_type as betType, t1.id as awardGroupid, t1.SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID as sysAwardGroupId, (select tt.award_name from game_award_group tt where tt.id = t1.sys_award_group_id) as awardName, (select tt.award_ret_status from game_award_group tt where tt.id = t1.sys_award_group_id) as awardRetStatus from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP t1, GAME_SERIES t2 where t1.USERID = #{userid} and t2.lotteryid = #{lotteryid} and t2.lotteryid = t1.lotteryid order by t2.lotteryid

select from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryid} and SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID=#{sysAwardGroupId} and status=1 and BET_TYPE=1 and userid in
#{item}
select AUG.USERID as userId, AUG.DIRECT_RET as RETVALUE from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP AUG where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryId} and SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID=#{sysAwardGroupId} and USERID=#{userAwardGroupIds}
select AUG.USERID as userId, AUG.THREEONE_RET as RETVALUE from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP AUG where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryId} and SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID=#{sysAwardGroupId} and USERID =#{userAwardGroupIds}
select AUG.USERID as userId, AUG.SUPER_RET as RETVALUE from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP AUG where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryId} and SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID=#{sysAwardGroupId} and USERID =#{userAwardGroupIds}
select AUG.USERID as userId, AUG.LHC_YEAR as RETVALUE from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP AUG where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryId} and SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID=#{sysAwardGroupId} and USERID =#{userAwardGroupIds}
select AUG.USERID as userId, AUG.LHC_COLOR as RETVALUE from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP AUG where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryId} and SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID=#{sysAwardGroupId} and USERID =#{userAwardGroupIds}
select AUG.USERID as userId, AUG.SB_THREE_ONE as RETVALUE from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP AUG where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryId} and SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID=#{sysAwardGroupId} and USERID =#{userAwardGroupIds}
select AUG.USERID as userId, AUG.LHC_FLATCODE as RETVALUE from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP AUG where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryId} and SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID=#{sysAwardGroupId} and USERID =#{userAwardGroupIds}
select AUG.USERID as userId, AUG.LHC_HALFWAVE as RETVALUE from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP AUG where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryId} and SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID=#{sysAwardGroupId} and USERID =#{userAwardGroupIds}
select AUG.USERID as userId, AUG.LHC_ONEYEAR as RETVALUE from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP AUG where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryId} and SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID=#{sysAwardGroupId} and USERID =#{userAwardGroupIds}
select AUG.USERID as userId, AUG.LHC_NOTIN as RETVALUE from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP AUG where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryId} and SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID=#{sysAwardGroupId} and USERID =#{userAwardGroupIds}
select AUG.USERID as userId, AUG.LHC_CONTINUEIN23 as RETVALUE from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP AUG where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryId} and SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID=#{sysAwardGroupId} and USERID =#{userAwardGroupIds}
select AUG.USERID as userId, AUG.LHC_CONTINUEIN4 as RETVALUE from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP AUG where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryId} and SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID=#{sysAwardGroupId} and USERID =#{userAwardGroupIds}
select AUG.USERID as userId, AUG.LHC_CONTINUEIN5 as RETVALUE from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP AUG where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryId} and SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID=#{sysAwardGroupId} and USERID =#{userAwardGroupIds}
select AUG.USERID as userId, AUG.LHC_CONTINUEINNOT23 as RETVALUE from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP AUG where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryId} and SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID=#{sysAwardGroupId} and USERID =#{userAwardGroupIds}
select AUG.USERID as userId, AUG.LHC_CONTINUENOTIN4 as RETVALUE from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP AUG where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryId} and SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID=#{sysAwardGroupId} and USERID =#{userAwardGroupIds}
select AUG.USERID as userId, AUG.LHC_CONTINUENOTIN5 as RETVALUE from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP AUG where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryId} and SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID=#{sysAwardGroupId} and USERID =#{userAwardGroupIds}
select AUG.USERID as userId, AUG.LHC_CONTINUECODE as RETVALUE from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP AUG where LOTTERYID=#{lotteryId} and SYS_AWARD_GROUP_ID=#{sysAwardGroupId} and USERID =#{userAwardGroupIds}
select AUG.USERID as userId, AUG.RET_VALUE as RETVALUE from GAME_AWARD_USER AUG where status=1 and bet_type_code=#{gameBetType} and lotteryId=#{lotteryId} and USERID =#{userId}
select from GAME_AWARD_USER_GROUP where id = #{id}

select max(s.ret_value) as directRet, min(s.ret_value) as minDirectRet from (select * from GAME_AWARD_USER t where t.AWARD_GROUP_ID = #{awardGroupId} and t.USERID = #{userid} and substr(t.bet_type_code,1,2) not in('44','45','46','47','48','49','50','51' and exists (select 1 from game_series sr where sr.lotteryid = t.lotteryid and sr.status = 1 )) s WHERE s.id not in (SELECT id from GAME_AWARD_USER where bet_type_code like '12_%_40' or bet_type_code like '13_%_40' or bet_type_code like '18_%')

select max(s.ret_value) as threeoneRet, min(s.ret_value) as minThreeoneRet from (select * from GAME_AWARD_USER t where t.AWARD_GROUP_ID = #{awardGroupId} and t.USERID = #{userid} and exists (select 1 from game_series sr where sr.lotteryid = t.lotteryid and sr.status = 1 )) s WHERE s.id in (SELECT id from GAME_AWARD_USER where bet_type_code like '12_%_40' or bet_type_code like '13_%_40' or bet_type_code like '18_%')

select max(s.ret_value) as superRet, min(s.ret_value) as minSuperRet from (select * from GAME_AWARD_USER t where t.AWARD_GROUP_ID = #{awardGroupId} and t.USERID = #{userid} and substr(t.bet_type_code,1,2) in('44','45','46','47','48','49','50','51') and exists (select 1 from game_series sr where sr.lotteryid = t.lotteryid and sr.status = 1 )) s
